dataManagement.checkDataError: An error occurred while checking data.
dataManagement.testRoomSuccess: Test chat room has been saved.
dataManagement.testRoomError: An error occurred while saving test data.

trash.title: Trash
trash.restoreConfirm: Do you want to restore this memo?
trash.deleteConfirm:
Do you want to permanently delete this memo?
Deleted memos cannot be recovered.

api.error: An error occurred while processing AI response.

searchMemos.description: Search user's memos with various conditions. Search by date, keyword, or time period.
searchMemos.keyword: Keyword to search (optional). Finds memos containing this keyword in their content.
searchMemos.month: Search specific month (YYYY-MM format, optional). e.g., '2025-08'
searchMemos.limit: Maximum number of memos to return (default: 10)
searchMemos.error: An error occurred while searching memos.

getStats.description: Get user's memo statistics. Provides information such as total memo count, date distribution, etc.
getStats.statsType: Statistics type (one of: total_count, monthly_distribution, recent_activity)
getStats.totalCount: You have a total of {{count}} memo(s).
getStats.error: An error occurred while retrieving memo statistics.

generateSummary.description: Summarize user's memos. Extract key content from memos filtered by specific time period or keywords to generate concise summaries.
generateSummary.dateFrom: Start date of memos to summarize (YYYY-MM-DD, optional)
generateSummary.dateTo: End date of memos to summarize (YYYY-MM-DD, optional)
generateSummary.month: Summarize specific month (YYYY-MM format, optional). e.g., '2025-08'
generateSummary.keyword: Summarize only memos related to specific keyword (optional)
generateSummary.noMemos: No memos match the specified conditions.
generateSummary.noMemosMessage: Cannot generate summary as no memos match the conditions.
generateSummary.error: An error occurred while generating summary.

extractTasks.description: Extract tasks or action items from user's memos. Recognizes patterns like 'need to do', 'should do', 'TODO', etc., to find action items.
extractTasks.dateFrom: Start date of memos to extract tasks from (YYYY-MM-DD, optional)
extractTasks.dateTo: End date of memos to extract tasks from (YYYY-MM-DD, optional)
extractTasks.keyword: Extract only tasks related to specific keyword (optional)
extractTasks.error: An error occurred while extracting tasks.

tools.executeError: An error occurred while executing tool: {{error}}

ai.systemPrompt:
You are a friendly and helpful memo assistant. 
- Use the provided tools only when you need information to answer questions about the user's memos
- For general conversations, greetings, and questions unrelated to memos, respond naturally without using tools
- Provide concise and helpful responses in English

chatRooms.createError: Error occurred while creating new chat room.
chatRooms.cannotDeleteLastRoom: Cannot delete the last chat room.
chatRooms.editError: Error occurred while editing room name.
chatRooms.titleLengthError: Room name must be 50 characters or less.
